Interface playn.core.TextLayout

Added Methods
float ascent() The space from the top of a line of text to the baseline.
float descent() The space from the baseline to the bottom of a line of text.
float leading() The space between the bottom of one line of text and the top of the next line of text.
Rectangle lineBounds(int) The bounds of the text on the given line.
